item.title: OpenAI 启动群聊功能试点，GPT‑5.1 提供支持
item.guid: OpenAI-启动群聊功能试点，GPT‑5.1-提供支持
item.description:
Yesterday, OpenAI posted an article on its official website, announcing the launch of a pilot program for ChatGPT group chat functionality in some regions. 昨天，OpenAI 在官方网站发文，宣布在部分地区启动 ChatGPT 群聊功能试点。

The new group chat feature allows users to collaborate with friends, family, or colleagues in the same conversation, while also bringing ChatGPT into the discussion. 新的群聊功能允许用户在同一对话中与朋友、家人或同事协作，并同时引入 ChatGPT 参与讨论。

Currently, the group chat feature is available to logged-in ChatGPT users in Japan, New Zealand, South Korea, and Taiwan, covering different subscription plans such as Free, Go, Plus, and Pro. 目前，群聊功能已在日本、新西兰、韩国和中国台湾地区面向已登录的 ChatGPT 用户开放，覆盖 Free、Go、Plus 和 Pro 等不同订阅计划。

Users can invite up to 20 people to a group chat via an invitation link. ChatGPT will decide whether to respond based on the context of the group chat and supports emoji reactions and personalized settings. 用户可通过邀请链接将至多 20 人加入群聊，ChatGPT 在群聊中会根据上下文选择是否回应，并支持表情反应及个性化设置。

OpenAI stated that group chats are completely separate from individual conversations, and users' personal memories will not be shared or recorded in group chats. The feature also provides additional safety measures for users under 18, allowing parents to disable group chats via control options. OpenAI 表示，群聊与个人对话完全分离，用户的个人记忆不会在群聊中共享或被记录。该功能还针对未满 18 岁的用户提供额外安全措施，家长可通过控制选项关闭群聊。

Technically, group chats are powered by GPT-5.1 Auto, which can automatically select the most suitable model to respond based on prompts. The features cover search, image generation, file uploads, and voice input, and response frequency limits only apply to ChatGPT's answers, not affecting message exchange between users. 技术上，群聊由 GPT‑5.1 Auto 提供支持，能够根据提示自动选择最合适的模型进行响应。功能涵盖搜索、图片生成、文件上传及语音输入，且响应频率限制仅适用于 ChatGPT 的回答，不影响用户之间的消息交流。

OpenAI emphasized that this pilot is the first step towards a shared collaborative space, and the company will determine the scope of future expansion based on early user feedback. OpenAI 强调，此次试点是迈向共享协作空间的第一步，公司将根据早期用户反馈决定后续扩展范围。

item.title: 消息称特斯拉正测试苹果 CarPlay 功能
item.guid: 消息称特斯拉正测试苹果-CarPlay-功能
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Tesla is developing support for Apple's "CarPlay" feature, hoping to boost vehicle sales in the coming months. 据彭博社报道，特斯拉正在开发支持苹果「CarPlay 车载」功能，以期在未来数月内推动车辆销量。

Sources revealed that the company has internally tested the feature and plans to embed CarPlay as a window in its own in-car system, supporting wireless connection, but the release date has not yet been finalized. 消息人士透露，该公司已在内部测试该功能，并计划在自家车机系统中以窗口形式嵌入 CarPlay，支持无线连接，但尚未最终确定发布时间。

The report points out that this move is seen as a significant shift for Tesla and its CEO, Elon Musk. Previously, Musk had long refused to introduce this popular in-car system and had repeatedly criticized Apple's app store policies. 报道指出，此举被视为特斯拉及其 CEO 马斯克的重大转变。此前，马斯克长期拒绝引入这一广受欢迎的车载系统，并多次批评苹果的应用商店政策。

As Apple terminated its car manufacturing plans in 2024, relations between the two parties have eased. Tesla is also facing sales pressure, with some consumers opting not to buy due to the lack of CarPlay support. 随着苹果在 2024 年终止造车计划，双方关系出现缓和，特斯拉也面临销量压力，部分消费者因缺乏 CarPlay 支持而放弃购买。

Since its launch in 2014, CarPlay has become a standard feature for many car manufacturers. Users can access Apple's Messages, Music, Maps, and Siri functions on their car's screen, while also being compatible with third-party apps like Google Maps and Spotify. CarPlay 自 2014 年推出以来，已成为众多车企的标配，用户可在车机屏幕上使用苹果的消息、音乐、地图及 Siri 等功能，同时兼容 Google Maps、Spotify 等第三方应用。

Tesla plans to adopt the standard version of CarPlay, rather than the latest CarPlay Ultra, which has greater permissions to access the dashboard and control functions such as seats and air conditioning. 特斯拉计划采用标准版 CarPlay，而非最新的 CarPlay Ultra，后者具有更大权限，可接入仪表盘、并控制座椅及空调等功能。

According to McKinsey's 2024 research, about one-third of car buyers stated that the lack of CarPlay or Android Auto would be a "veto factor" in their purchasing decision. Therefore, some outside observers believe that Tesla's shift is aimed at responding to user demand and maintaining its leading position in the U.S. market. 根据麦肯锡在 2024 年的研究，约三分之一的购车者表示，缺乏 CarPlay 或 Android Auto 将成为购车决策的「否决因素」。因此，外界有观点认为，特斯拉此次转向旨在回应用户需求和保持在美市场领先地位。

item.title: 胖东来推行零彩礼结婚政策满一年，新奖励措施再出台
item.guid: 胖东来推行零彩礼结婚政策满一年，新奖励措施再出台
item.description:
Yesterday, Yu Donglai, the founder of Pang Dong Lai, summarized the achievements of the "zero bride price" marriage policy after one year of implementation on his personal social media platform. 昨天，胖东来创始人于东来在个人社交平台总结结婚零彩礼政策实施一周年的成果。

He emphasized "promoting good customs and culture, no bride price, no lavish banquets, and not letting parents buy houses or cars" to reduce family financial burdens and mental stress. In the past year, over 100 couples have implemented this policy, and the company has decided to formulate reward measures to encourage more employees to adopt it. 他强调「弘扬良好的风俗文化、不要彩礼、不大办酒席、不让父母买房买车」，以减轻家庭经济负担和精神压力。过去一年，已有超过 100 对新人落实该政策，公司决定制定奖励措施以鼓励更多员工采纳。

On January 3, 2025, Yu Donglai announced the "Pang Dong Lai Employee Marriage Implementation Standards" on his personal social media platform, stipulating standards for matters such as bride price, dowry, housing, cars, and banquets for Pang Dong Lai's official employees when they get married. 2025年1月3日，于东来在个人社交平台公布《胖东来人结婚执行标准》，对胖东来正式员工结婚时涉及彩礼、嫁妆、房车、酒席等事项的标准进行规定。

Among them, the document clearly stipulates that employees getting married shall not receive or pay bride price or dowry, nor shall they rely on parents' savings to buy houses or cars. If parents' financial conditions permit, early arrangements can be made through "loans," but a repayment plan must be formulated. 其中，该文件明确规定员工结婚不得收取或支付彩礼嫁妆，不得依赖父母积蓄购房买车。如父母经济条件允许，可通过「借款」形式提前安置，但需制定归还计划。

If the company's marriage standards are violated, it will be considered a breach of corporate values. Within 12 months from the date of violation, employees will only be entitled to statutory labor remuneration and benefits, and will not receive additional company rewards. 若违反公司结婚标准，将被视为违背企业价值观，自违规之日起 12 个月内仅享有法定劳动报酬及福利，不得获得公司额外奖励。

Pang Dong Lai's additional benefits include annual physical leave, 10 days of free leave, annual welfare, eligibility for cultural award projects, eligibility for annual outstanding employee selection, and eligibility for competitive positions. The company believes that this policy helps promote relaxed and harmonious family relationships and fosters a healthier lifestyle. 胖东来额外福利包括年体假、10 天自由假、年度福利、文化奖励项目评选资格、年度优秀员工评选资格及竞聘资格。公司认为，该政策有助于推动轻松和睦的家庭关系，并形成更健康的生活方式。

item.title: 存储芯片价格飙升，多家手机厂商暂缓采购
item.guid: 存储芯片价格飙升，多家手机厂商暂缓采购
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, several mobile phone manufacturers temporarily suspended procurement yesterday due to the continuous surge in storage chip prices. 据界面新闻报道，昨天多家手机厂商因存储芯片价格持续飙升而暂缓采购。

Manufacturers like Xiaomi, OPPO, and vivo generally have less than two months of inventory, with some DRAM stock even less than three weeks. They are hesitating whether to accept the original manufacturers' price hike quotes of nearly 50%. 小米、OPPO、vivo 等厂商库存普遍低于两个月，部分 DRAM 库存甚至不足三周，正在犹豫是否接受原厂接近 50% 的涨幅报价。

Industry insiders point out that as the demand for large AI models drives data center procurement, server customers are willing to pay higher prices, leading to quotes for the same storage products in the server market being generally more than 30% higher than those for mobile phone manufacturers. 业内人士指出，随着 AI 大模型需求推动数据中心采购，服务器客户愿意支付更高价格，导致同款存储产品在服务器市场的报价普遍比手机厂商高出 30% 以上。

The report shows that Samsung had previously suspended DDR5 DRAM contract quotes for October, and spot prices rose by 25% within a week. 报道显示，三星此前已暂停 10 月 DDR5 DRAM 合约报价，现货价格在一周内上涨 25%。

At the same time, storage giants such as Samsung, Hynix, Kioxia, and Micron all cut NAND flash supply in the second half of the year to drive price increases. SanDisk significantly raised NAND contract prices by as much as 50% in November, prompting other manufacturers like Micron to follow suit. 同时，三星、海力士、铠侠、美光等存储巨头下半年均削减 NAND 闪存供应量，以推动价格上调。闪迪在 11 月大幅调涨 NAND 合约价，涨幅高达 50%，引发美光等厂商跟进。

Supply chain sources revealed that mobile phone manufacturers generally have over a month's worth of DRAM and about two months' worth of NAND. Since storage chips are known as the "second largest component" of mobile phones, accounting for 10%-30% of the cost, this round of price increases has led to a general rise of 100-500 yuan for mid-to-high-end models. For example, the price difference for different configurations of the OPPO Find X9 series reaches 900 yuan. 供应链人士透露，手机厂商的 DRAM 水位普遍在一个多月，NAND 水位约两个月。由于存储芯片被称为手机的「第二大件」，成本占比在 10%-30% 之间，本轮涨价已导致中高端机型普遍上涨 100-500 元。例如 OPPO Find X9 系列不同配置版本价差达 900 元。

Industry analysis suggests that original manufacturers' inventory is nearing depletion, leaving little room for price reductions. Except for Apple, other manufacturers have limited bargaining power. As AI demand continues to push production lines towards QLC technology, a decrease in NAND output is inevitable. Storage chip prices are expected to rise further in the first half of next year, and the mobile phone industry may face the difficult choice between reducing specifications and increasing prices. 业内分析认为，当前原厂库存即将见底，价格难有松动空间。除苹果外，其他厂商议价能力有限。随着 AI 需求持续推高产线转向 QLC 工艺，NAND 产量下降不可避免。预计存储芯片价格将在明年上半年进一步上涨，手机行业或面临减配与涨价的艰难选择。

item.title: 字节推出游戏 Agent，能自己「玩」原神
item.guid: 字节推出游戏-Agent，能自己「玩」原神
item.description:
Recently, ByteDance launched its general AI agent 'Lumine', demonstrating high autonomy and cross-scenario generalization capabilities in the 3D open-world game 'Genshin Impact'. 近日，字节跳动推出通用 AI 智能体「Lumine」，在 3D 开放世界游戏《原神》中展现出高度自主性与跨场景泛化能力。

It is reported that the system can complete main quests lasting several hours without human intervention and achieve autonomous navigation in unfamiliar scenarios. 据悉，该系统能够在无人工干预的情况下完成长达数小时的主线任务，并在陌生场景中实现自主导航。

Based on the Qwen2-VL-7B-Base model, the research team adopted a human-like interaction paradigm, integrating perception, reasoning, and operation, forming three-stage versions: 'Base', 'Instruct', and 'Thinking', corresponding to basic action learning, instruction following, and long-period reasoning training, respectively. 研究团队基于 Qwen2-VL-7B-Base 模型，采用类人交互范式，将感知、推理与操作统一整合，形成了「Base」「Instruct」「Thinking」三阶段版本，分别对应基础动作学习、指令跟随与长周期推理训练。

In the main storyline of the Mondstadt region, the Lumine-Thinking model completed the Chapter 1 task in 56 minutes with a 100% success rate, proving more efficient than GPT-5's 112 minutes. 在蒙德地区的主线剧情中，Lumine-Thinking 模型耗时 56 分钟完成第一章任务，成功率达 100%，相比 GPT-5 的 112 分钟更具效率。

In the combined 4.7-hour tasks of Chapters 2 and 3, the completion rate approached 98.2%, significantly surpassing Gemini 2.5 Pro's 65%. 在第二、三章合计 4.7 小时的任务中，完成率接近 98.2%，远超 Gemini 2.5 Pro 的 65%。

Furthermore, the model demonstrated strong adaptability in untrained games such as 'Wuthering Waves', 'Honkai: Star Rail', and 'Black Myth: Wukong'. Specifically, it took 7.2 hours to complete the Chapter 1 task in 'Honkai: Star Rail', with a completion rate exceeding 92%. 此外，该模型在《鸣潮》《崩坏：星穹铁道》以及《黑神话·悟空》等未训练过的游戏中也展现出较强的适配能力，其中在《崩坏：星穹铁道》第一章任务中耗时 7.2 小时，完成率超过 92%。

On the technical front, Lumine achieves real-time interaction through visual input and keyboard/mouse operation modeling, with end-to-end latency reduced to 129.8ms. Its hybrid thinking strategy triggers reasoning only at critical nodes, effectively ensuring the coherence of long tasks. The team also adopted a sliding window mechanism and phased optimization strategies to enhance stability and efficiency in long-period tasks. 技术层面，Lumine 通过视觉输入与键鼠操作建模实现实时交互，端到端延迟降至 129.8ms。其混合思考策略仅在关键节点触发推理，有效保障了长任务的连贯性。团队还采用滑动窗口机制与分阶段优化策略，提升了长周期任务中的稳定性与效率。

item.title: 范式智能发布 AI 专属「超级内存」Fusion-NAND
item.guid: 范式智能发布-AI-专属「超级内存」Fusion-NAND
item.description:
Yesterday, Paradigm AI officially released 'Fusion-NAND', an efficient storage expansion card custom-designed for the open-source machine learning database OpenMLDB. 昨天，范式智能正式发布专为开源机器学习数据库 OpenMLDB 定制的高效存储扩展卡「Fusion-NAND」。

According to reports, this product aims to solve the high-cost problem in AI real-time feature computation and long-window analysis scenarios with near-memory performance, significantly reducing the total cost of ownership (TCO) for enterprises deploying high-performance machine learning applications. 据介绍，该产品旨在以近似内存的性能体验，解决 AI 实时特征计算与长窗口分析场景中的高成本问题，显著降低企业部署高性能机器学习应用的总拥有成本（TCO）。

OpenMLDB is an open-source database system by Paradigm AI that addresses the industry pain point of inconsistency between 'features used during training' and 'real-time inference features online', enabling 'one-time modeling, multi-terminal reuse'. Specific highlights include: OpenMLDB 是范式智能开源的数据库系统，解决了「训练时用的特征」与「线上实时推理特征」不一致的行业痛点，实现「一次建模，多端复用」。具体亮点如下：

    Can be expanded to 4 times the capacity of pure memory solutions, reducing overall hardware costs by up to approximately 80%;

    Single-node throughput can reach 1.2 billion features per second, with P99 latency stable at millisecond level;

    Supports AES-256 encryption, TCG Opal 2.0 protocol, and power-off protection, with an MTBF exceeding 2 million hours.

item.title: 苹果 Apple Store 应用图标更新液态玻璃效果
item.guid: 苹果-Apple-Store-应用图标更新液态玻璃效果
item.description:
Yesterday, Apple officially pushed an update for the Apple Store app, version 6.6. This upgrade brings a new icon and interface optimizations, better aligning with the 'liquid glass' system visual style of iOS 26 and iPadOS 26. 昨天，苹果正式推送 Apple Store 应用更新，版本号为 6.6。本次升级带来全新图标及界面优化，更加契合 iOS 26 与 iPadOS 26 的「液态玻璃」系统视觉风格。

The new icon abandons the old white background, adopting a blue gradient base, with the central shopping bag icon incorporating a 'liquid glass' texture. Internal app adjustments were also made, with the navigation bar redesigned to a transparent rounded-corner style, paired with similarly styled slider controls. 新图标摒弃了旧版的白色背景，采用蓝色渐变底色，中央购物袋图标融入「液态玻璃」质感。应用内部也同步调整，导航栏改为透明圆角设计，搭配同风格滑动控件。

item.title: 理想汽车两起质量事故问责 18 人，此前曾大规模召回
item.guid: 理想汽车两起质量事故问责-18-人，此前曾大规模召回
item.description:
According to 21st Century Business Herald, yesterday, Li Auto issued an internal accountability announcement regarding two mass quality incidents, with a total of 18 employees disciplined. 据 21 世纪经济报道，昨天，理想汽车针对两起批量质量事故发布内部问责公告，共处理 18 名相关员工。

The announcement revealed that some 2024 MEGA models were found to have three reasons for coolant leakage: insufficient coolant verification, inadequate power battery testing and risk assessment, and improper response from R&D quality and service departments. 公告显示，部分 2024 款 MEGA 车型因冷却液渗漏问题被查明存在三方面原因：冷却液验证不足、动力电池试验与风险评估不充分，以及研发质量与服务部门应对不当。

Additionally, some 2025 L-series vehicles were found to have lower control arm bushing abnormal noise issues, attributed to insufficient test verification, severely impacting user experience. 此外，2025 款 L 系列部分车辆因下摆臂衬套异响问题被认定为试验验证不充分所致，严重影响用户体验。

The company took measures to terminate contracts for direct employees involved, and imposed penalties on their direct managers and department heads, including annual performance not higher than I, cancellation of year-end bonuses, and disqualification for promotion. 公司对环节上的直接员工采取解除合同的措施，对其直接管理人和部门负责人采取年度绩效不高于 I，取消年终奖、取消晋升资格的处罚。

Previously, Li Auto had conducted multiple recalls and technical investigations due to quality issues, including recalling 11,411 units of the 2024 MEGA in late October and conducting technical conclusion research on a fire incident. 此前，理想汽车已多次因质量问题进行召回与技术调查，包括 10 月底召回 11411 辆 2024 款 MEGA，并对起火事件展开技术结论研究。

item.title: 马斯克加速半导体本土化布局，德州封装厂 2026 年投产
item.guid: 马斯克加速半导体本土化布局，德州封装厂-2026-年投产
item.description:
According to DIGITIMES, Elon Musk is accelerating the localization of the US semiconductor industry. His fan-out panel-level packaging (FOPLP) factory in Texas has entered the equipment delivery phase and is expected to begin mass production in Q3 2026, reaching full capacity in Q1 2027. 据 DIGITIMES 报道，Elon Musk 正在加速推动美国半导体产业的本土化布局，其位于德州的扇出型面板级封装（FOPLP）工厂已进入设备交付阶段，预计将在 2026 年第三季度开始量产，并于 2027 年第一季度达到满产。

In a recent strategic adjustment, Musk diversified Dojo 3 AI chip production to TSMC and Samsung, with Intel's Arizona factory handling the packaging. Musk 在近期的战略调整中，将 Dojo 3 AI 芯片生产分散至台积电与三星，同时由英特尔亚利桑那工厂负责封装。

He also hinted at deeper future cooperation with Intel to expand joint manufacturing capabilities. Meanwhile, SpaceX has completed the construction and operation of its Texas printed circuit board (PCB) factory, further strengthening vertical integration, especially for the chip demands of the Starlink satellite system. 他还暗示未来可能与英特尔展开更深入的合作，以扩大联合制造能力。与此同时，SpaceX 已完成德州印刷电路板（PCB）工厂建设并投入运营，进一步强化垂直整合，尤其针对星链卫星系统的芯片需求。

Sources say the FOPLP factory's initial monthly capacity will be around 2,000 units, gradually reducing reliance on external wafers from STMicroelectronics and Innolux. 消息人士称，FOPLP 工厂初期月产能约为 2000 单位，逐步减少对 STMicroelectronics 与 Innolux 外部晶圆的依赖。

At a recent Tesla shareholder meeting, Musk revealed his plan to build a large wafer fab with an initial capacity of 100,000 wafers per month, potentially expanding to 1 million wafers in the future, to meet Tesla's growing demand for AI and robotics chips. Musk 在日前的特斯拉股东大会上透露，他计划建设一座大型晶圆厂，初始产能为每月 10 万片，未来有望扩展至 100 万片，以满足特斯拉在 AI 与机器人芯片方面的增长需求。

Analysts point out that Musk's strategy aims to reduce supply chain risks and lessen reliance on manufacturing in Taiwan. Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, however, emphasized that advanced process technology is extremely complex, and even Musk would find it difficult to replace TSMC's leading position in the short term. 分析人士指出，Musk 的战略旨在降低供应链风险，减少对中国台湾制造的依赖。英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋则强调，先进制程的复杂性极高，即便是 Musk 也难以在短期内取代台积电的领先地位。

However, market observers believe that Musk's wafer fab is feasible in the mid-to-low-end chip sector, potentially focusing on 14nm and above nodes initially. 不过，市场观察人士认为，Musk 的晶圆厂在中低端芯片领域具备可行性，初期可能专注于 14nm 及以上节点。

item.title: 小米发布端侧智能家居 AI 大模型 Miloco
item.guid: 小米发布端侧智能家居-AI-大模型-Miloco
item.description:
Just two days after former DeepSeek researcher Luo Fuli announced on social media her joining the Xiaomi MiMo team, Xiaomi officially launched its future smart home exploration solution, Xiaomi Miloco (full name Xiaomi Local Copilot), yesterday, introducing large AI model capabilities into whole-house smart scenarios for the first time. 在前 DeepSeek 研究员罗福莉朋友圈官宣加入小米 MiMo 团队的消息传出仅 2 天后，昨天，小米正式发布智能家居未来探索方案 Xiaomi Miloco（全称 Xiaomi Local Copilot），率先将 AI 大模型能力引入全屋智能场景。

According to reports, the core of Miloco lies in achieving intelligent interaction of "perception + understanding" through its self-developed Xiaomi MiMo-VL-Miloco-7B edge-side visual language large model. 据介绍，Miloco 的核心在于通过自研 Xiaomi MiMo-VL-Miloco-7B 端侧视觉语言大模型，实现「感知 + 理解」的智能交互。

Users do not need tedious rule settings; they simply express their needs in natural language, and the system can complete complex scene linkages through inference and computation. For example, "When I'm reading, help me turn on the desk lamp and play music," Miloco can automatically recognize and execute. 用户无需繁琐的规则设定，只需以自然语言表达需求，系统即可通过推理计算完成复杂场景联动。例如「当我读书时，帮我打开台灯并播放音乐」，Miloco 能够自动识别并执行。

Furthermore, Xiaomi emphasizes the model's advantages in privacy and security, as all visual data is processed on the edge device and not uploaded to external servers, ensuring user privacy is not leaked. 此外，小米还强调模型在隐私安全方面具有优势，所有视觉数据均在端侧完成处理，不上传至外部服务器，保障用户隐私不外流。

At the same time, Miloco connects the Mijia ecosystem with Home Assistant via the MCP protocol and opens up support for third-party IoT platform access, achieving cross-ecosystem collaboration. 同时，Miloco 通过 MCP 协议打通米家生态与 Home Assistant，并开放支持第三方 IoT 平台接入，实现跨生态协同。

In terms of technical architecture, Miloco adopts a four-layer system (user layer, application layer, capability platform layer, hardware layer), providing developers with full-link open capabilities, supporting functional expansion and co-creation. 在技术架构上，Miloco 采用四层体系（用户层、应用层、能力平台层、硬件层），为开发者提供全链路开放能力，支持功能扩展与共创。

Xiaomi states that the goal of this exploration solution is to shift smart homes from "people adapting to devices" to "devices adapting to people," driving the industry towards a more open and intelligent direction. 小米表示，这一探索方案的目标是让智能家居从「人适应设备」转向「设备适应人」，推动行业迈向更开放、更智能的方向。

item.title: 《荒野大镖客：救赎》下月登陆更多平台
item.guid: 《荒野大镖客：救赎》下月登陆更多平台
item.description:
Rockstar Games officially announced yesterday that its classic open-world game "Red Dead Redemption" will officially launch on iOS, Android, PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch 2 platforms on December 2nd. This ported version includes the "Undead Nightmare" DLC and all content from the "Game of the Year Edition," optimized for different platforms. Rockstar Games 昨日官宣，旗下经典开放世界游戏《荒野大镖客：救赎》将于 12 月 2 日正式登陆 iOS、Android、PS5、Xbox Series X/S 以及任天堂 Switch 2 平台。此次移植版本包含「不死梦魇」DLC 与《年度最佳版》全部内容，并针对不同平台进行优化。

For mobile platforms, the iOS and Android versions are exclusively published by Netflix. Players need an active Netflix membership subscription to play, and only the single-player mode is retained, with multiplayer functionality removed. This version has been optimized for touch screen operation, including virtual buttons and interface adjustments. 在移动端方面，iOS 与 Android 版本由 Netflix 独占发行，玩家需持有有效 Netflix 会员订阅才能游玩，且仅保留单人模式，移除多人联机功能。该版本针对触屏操作进行了优化，包括虚拟按键与界面调整。

For next-gen consoles, the PS5 and Xbox Series X/S versions support up to 4K 60fps, with added HDR effects and graphical enhancements. The PS5 version will also be added to the PlayStation Plus game catalog, allowing subscribers to play for free. Additionally, GTA+ members can directly unlock the PS5 and Xbox Series X/S versions, and free upgrades and save data continuity are supported. 在次世代主机方面，PS5 与 Xbox Series X/S 版本支持最高 4K 60 帧运行，新增 HDR 效果与画质增强。PS5 版本还将加入 PlayStation Plus 游戏目录，订阅用户可免费游玩，同时，GTA + 会员可直接解锁 PS5 与 Xbox Series X/S 版，并且支持免费升级、存档延续。

The Nintendo Switch 2 version will support 60fps for the first time, featuring DLSS technology and HDR, and even offering keyboard and mouse control mode to fully leverage the new hardware's performance. Furthermore, PS4 and original Switch players can upgrade to the new version for free and continue their existing saves. 任天堂 Switch 2 版本首次支持 60 帧运行，并搭载 DLSS 技术与 HDR，甚至提供键鼠操作模式，以充分发挥新硬件性能。此外，PS4 与初代 Switch 玩家可免费升级至新版本，并延续原有存档。

This port was co-developed by Double Eleven and Cast Iron Games, further expanding the platform coverage of "Red Dead Redemption," allowing more players to experience John Marston's Western adventure and the zombie survival storyline of "Undead Nightmare" on mobile and console devices. 此次移植由 Double Eleven 与 Cast Iron Games 合作开发，进一步扩展了《荒野大镖客：救赎》的平台覆盖范围，使更多玩家能够在移动与主机设备上体验约翰 · 马斯顿的西部冒险与「不死梦魇」的僵尸生存剧情。

item.title: Google 为 Pixel 手机推送通话录音功能
item.guid: Google-为-Pixel-手机推送通话录音功能
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Google officially announced yesterday that it is rolling out the call recording feature for the "Phone" app to Pixel phone users worldwide. 据 Android Authority 报道，昨天，Google 正式宣布在全球范围内向 Pixel 手机用户推送「电话」App 的通话录音功能。

Previously, this feature was only tested in some regions, but now it officially covers Pixel 6 and newer models running Android 14 or above. 此前，该功能仅在部分地区测试，如今正式覆盖运行 Android 14 或以上版本的 Pixel 6 及更新机型。

This update requires users to upgrade the Google "Phone" App to the latest version, or install the November Pixel system update to enable it. 此次更新要求用户将 Google「电话」App 升级至最新版本，或安装 11 月 Pixel 系统更新后方可启用。

The activation path is "Settings > Call Assistant > Call Recording". Users can choose to record manually, automatically record calls from specific numbers, or record calls from unknown numbers. 启用路径为「设置 > 通话助手 > 通话录音」，用户可选择手动录音、自动录制特定号码来电，或录制陌生号码来电。

Google states that upon first activation, the app will prompt users on how recordings are handled and will automatically play a tone or announcement when call recording begins, to comply with legal requirements in different regions. Google 表示，首次启用时应用会提示录音处理方式，并在通话开始录音时自动播放提示音或公告，以满足不同地区的法律合规要求。

It is worth noting that non-Pixel devices running Android 9 and above can also achieve call recording through the Google "Phone" App, but with different conditions. 值得注意的是，非 Pixel 设备若运行 Android 9 及以上版本，也可通过 Google「电话」App 实现通话录音，但条件有所不同。

item.title: 迪士尼加码短视频战略，瞄准《Bluey》成功模式
item.guid: 迪士尼加码短视频战略，瞄准《Bluey》成功模式
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Disney plans to add more short-form video content to the Disney+ platform to replicate the success of "Bluey". 据彭博社报道，迪士尼计划在 Disney+ 平台增加更多短视频内容，以复制《Bluey》的成功模式。

Eric Schrier, President of Disney Television Studios, stated that short-form video in a streaming environment provides more flexible space for storytelling, breaking through the limitations of traditional half-hour or one-hour program lengths. 迪士尼电视工作室总裁 Eric Schrier 表示，流媒体环境下的短视频形式为叙事提供了更灵活的空间，能够突破传统半小时或一小时节目时长的限制。

"Bluey", produced by BBC Studios and Australian partners, is only 7 minutes per episode and has maintained high popularity since its launch nearly six years ago, becoming one of the most successful children's programs in the Disney+ streaming era. 《Bluey》由 BBC Studios 与澳大利亚合作方制作，每集仅 7 分钟，自上线近六年以来一直保持高人气，成为 Disney+ 流媒体时代最成功的儿童节目之一。

Disney CEO Bob Iger pointed out in yesterday's analyst call that AI technology may offer new possibilities for users to create and share short videos on Disney+. He emphasized that in the future, the platform will allow users to generate and consume more short video content, thereby enhancing the interactive experience. 迪士尼 CEO Bob Iger 在昨天的分析师电话会议上指出，AI 技术可能为用户在 Disney+ 上创作和分享短视频提供新的可能性。他强调，未来平台将允许用户生成并消费更多短视频内容，从而提升互动体验。

Industry data shows that short videos on platforms like TikTok and YouTube are rapidly capturing user attention. Nielsen statistics indicate that YouTube has become the largest channel for monthly TV viewing share. Meanwhile, "micro-short dramas" originating from China are becoming one of the fastest-growing content types globally. 行业数据显示，TikTok 与 YouTube 等平台的短视频正在快速抢占用户注意力。Nielsen 的统计显示，YouTube 已成为月度电视观看份额最大的渠道。同时，源自中国的「微短剧」正在成为全球增长最快的内容类型之一。

item.title: Verizon 宣布裁员 1.5 万人，史上最大规模削减成本
item.guid: Verizon-宣布裁员-1.5-万人，史上最大规模削减成本
item.description:
According to The Wall Street Journal, U.S. telecom operator Verizon is planning to lay off approximately 15,000 people to cope with intensifying competition in wireless services and home internet and to cut costs. 据《华尔街日报》报道，美国电信运营商 Verizon 正计划裁员约 1.5 万人，以应对无线服务和家庭互联网领域日益激烈的竞争并削减成本。

This layoff is the largest in the company's history, expected to begin next week, with most being carried out through dismissals. Meanwhile, Verizon also plans to convert about 200 stores into franchises, removing employees from its payroll system. 此次裁员规模为该公司历史上最大，预计将于下周启动，大部分将通过解雇方式进行。 与此同时，Verizon 还计划将约 200 家门店转为特许经营，使员工脱离其薪酬体系。

As of February, Verizon had approximately 100,000 employees. As the largest telecom provider in the U.S., the company has seen a loss in its postpaid phone subscriber market for three consecutive quarters. 截至 2 月，Verizon 拥有约 10 万名员工。作为美国最大的电信供应商，该公司在后付费电话用户市场连续三个季度出现流失。

In the last fiscal quarter, Verizon lost 7,000 postpaid phone subscribers, a stark contrast to Wall Street analysts' previous forecast of an increase of 19,000. In comparison, the number of relevant subscribers for the other two U.S. operators, AT&T and T-Mobile, continued to grow. 上一财季，Verizon 净流失 7000 个后付费电话用户，与华尔街分析师此前预测的增加 19000 个形成鲜明对比。相比之下，美国另外两家运营商 AT&T 和 T-Mobile 的相关用户数量则持续增长。

Last month, Verizon appointed Daniel Schulman, its lead independent director, as the new CEO. Schulman, who previously served as CEO of PayPal and Virgin Mobile USA, emphasized in the earnings call that the company would significantly cut its overall cost base and take measures to reverse customer churn. 上个月，Verizon 任命首席独立董事丹尼尔 · 舒尔曼为新任 CEO。舒尔曼曾担任 PayPal 和 Virgin Mobile USA 的 CEO，他在财报电话会议中强调，公司将大幅削减整体成本基础，并采取措施扭转客户流失。

He stated: "We have a tremendous opportunity to improve efficiency and become leaner and more agile. Cost-cutting will become our new normal." 他表示：「我们有巨大的机会可以提高效率，变得更精简干练。削减成本将成为我们的一种常态。」

Furthermore, Schulman noted earlier this week that the iteration cycle for AI models has shortened to two months, predicting that AI will reach human-level intelligence faster than most people expect. 此外，舒尔曼在本周早些时候指出，AI 模型迭代周期已缩短至两个月，并预测 AI 达到人类水准智能的速度将比大多数人的预期更快。

item.title: AI 玩具防护机制失效，儿童心理发展引担忧
item.guid: AI-玩具防护机制失效，儿童心理发展引担忧
item.description:
According to Futurism, a recent test result released by the U.S. Public Interest Research Group (PIRG) shows that several AI toys for children pose serious safety risks during long conversations, even providing detailed information about matches, knives, and sexual behavior to 5-year-olds. 据 Futurism 报道，美国公共利益研究组织（PIRG）近日发布的一份最新测试结果显示，多款面向儿童的 AI 玩具在长时间对话中出现严重安全隐患，甚至向 5 岁儿童提供关于火柴、刀具及性行为的详细信息。

The research team tested three AI toys, including FoloToy's "Kumma" teddy bear, the Miko 3 robot, and Curio's "Grok" rocket-shaped toy. 研究团队测试了 3 款 AI 玩具，包括 FoloToy 的「Kumma」泰迪熊、Miko 3 机器人以及 Curio 的「Grok」火箭造型玩具。

In short interactions, these toys were able to avoid inappropriate questions relatively well, but during long conversations lasting 10 minutes to an hour, the protective mechanisms gradually failed. 在短时互动中，这些玩具能较好地回避不当问题，但在 10 分钟至 1 小时的长对话中，防护机制逐渐失效。

Kumma, using the Mistral model, had previously described in a childlike tone the steps to light a match during testing, and offered ways to find knives and drugs; when using the GPT-4o model, Kumma even delved into sexual topics, involving fetishism, role-playing, and corporal punishment scenarios. 使用 Mistral 模型的 Kumma 在测试中曾以儿童语气详细描述点燃火柴的步骤，并提供寻找刀具和药物的方式；在使用 GPT-4o 模型时，Kumma 甚至进入性话题，涉及恋物癖、角色扮演及体罚场景。

Miko 3, on the other hand, had told users set to age 5 how to find matches and plastic bags, while Grok glorified the concept of "dying in battle" during conversations. 而 Miko 3 曾告诉设定为 5 岁的用户如何找到火柴和塑料袋、Grok 则在对话中美化「战死」的概念。

Researchers warn that these products, rapidly entering the market without regulation, could have profound impacts on children's mental health and social development. 研究人员警告，这类产品在缺乏监管的情况下快速进入市场，可能对儿童的心理健康和社会发展造成深远影响。

RJ Cross, PIRG project leader, stated that AI toys currently have almost no regulation, and parents often overlook potential risks when purchasing them. She emphasized that even if future technological improvements can better filter inappropriate content, their long-term impact on children's social development remains unpredictable. PIRG 项目负责人 RJ Cross 表示，目前 AI 玩具几乎没有监管，家长在购买时往往忽视潜在风险。她强调，即便未来技术改进能更好地过滤不当内容，仍无法预估其对儿童长期社会发展的影响。

item.title: 奶牛快传宣布停运，9 年运营画上句号
item.guid: 奶牛快传宣布停运，9-年运营画上句号
item.description:
Recently, the online file transfer platform "CowTransfer" announced that it will cease all operations starting December 8, 2025. Login, upload, download, and other functions will be simultaneously shut down. The official notice reminds users to complete data backup before the shutdown, otherwise files will not be recoverable. 近日，在线文件传输平台「奶牛快传」（CowTransfer）宣布将于 2025 年 12 月 8 日起全面停止运营。届时登录、上传、下载等功能将同步关闭。官方提醒用户务必在关停前完成数据备份，否则文件将无法恢复。

CowTransfer was founded by Zhang Chen and Wang Chenghuai in 2016 and has been operating for over 9 years. The platform's core selling points were "no registration, no speed limits, and support for large file transfers," allowing free users to transfer single files up to 5GB without ad interference. 奶牛快传由张晨、王承槐于 2016 年创立，至今已运营超过 9 年。该平台以「免注册、不限速、支持大文件传输」为核心卖点，免费用户可传输单个最大 5GB 文件，并且无广告干扰。

In 2019, CowTransfer launched a mini-program and mobile app, further expanding its usage scenarios. However, as giants like Baidu Netdisk, Alibaba Cloud Drive, and Tencent's products dominated the market with their vast ecosystem advantages, the lightweight "use-and-go" model gradually fell into profitability difficulties. 2019 年，奶牛快传推出小程序与移动 APP，进一步拓展使用场景。然而随着百度网盘、阿里云盘、腾讯系产品等巨头凭借庞大生态优势占据市场主导地位，轻量化的「即用即走」模式逐渐陷入盈利困境。

In early 2021, the platform attempted a paid model, but this contrasted with its earlier free strategy, leading to a significant loss of users. In June of the same year, CowTransfer was acquired by Gaoding Design, and team resources gradually shifted towards new projects. 2021 年初，平台尝试收费模式，但与早期免费策略形成反差，导致用户大量流失。同年 6 月，奶牛快传被稿定设计收购，团队资源逐渐向新项目倾斜。

The official statement indicated that this shutdown is a "strategic team adjustment," and in the future, the focus will be on the upgrade and development of Gaoding Design, covering features such as file sharing, multi-person collaboration, online design, and AI creation, primarily serving the creator community. 官方表示，此次停运是「团队战略性调整」，未来将专注于稿定设计的升级与开发，涵盖文件分享、多人协作、在线设计及 AI 创作等功能，核心服务于创作者群体。

Founder Zhang Chen thanked former competitors in his response, stating, "I hope you all continue to persevere and keep up the good work." 创始人张晨在回应中感谢曾经的竞争对手，并表示「希望你们继续坚持，加油」。

item.title: 💡 美国风投公司 CEO：部分 AI 市场已现泡沫
item.guid: 💡-美国风投公司-CEO：部分-AI-市场已现泡沫
item.description:
According to Yahoo Finance, Robert Smith, CEO of U.S. venture capital firm Vista, recently stated on the Invest program that while some parts of the AI market show signs of a bubble, other areas still hold long-term investment value. 据雅虎财经报道，美国风投公司 Vista CEO Robert Smith 近日在 Invest 栏目表示，部分 AI 市场已出现泡沫迹象，但另一些领域仍具备长期投资价值。

He pointed out that the main bottleneck for the U.S. in building AI infrastructure is the power supply for data centers, whereas some overseas markets have relatively surplus power resources. The key lies in whether these can be effectively converted into available computing power support. 他指出，美国在建设 AI 基础设施时面临的主要瓶颈是数据中心的电力供应，而部分海外市场则拥有相对过剩的电力资源，关键在于能否有效转化为可用的算力支持。

Smith emphasized that 18 companies under Vista have already launched and installed AI Agent solutions, achieving tangible results in the market. Smith 强调，Vista 旗下已有 18 家企业推出并安装了 AI Agent 解决方案，并在市场中取得实际成果。

He believes that AI will significantly boost productivity but will also impact the job market, especially sales positions. 他认为，AI 将显著提升生产力，但也会对就业市场带来冲击，尤其是销售岗位。

According to his analysis, sales personnel spend only about 15% of their time on direct selling, with the rest spent on writing, record-keeping, and strategy development, tasks that are gradually being replaced by AI Agents. This means junior sales support positions may face greater pressure. 根据他的分析，销售人员仅约 15% 的时间用于直接销售，其余时间多花在写作、记录和策略制定上，而这些工作正逐步由 AI Agent 取代。这意味着初级销售支持岗位可能面临更大压力。

The report cited a Stanford University study stating that since the popularization of GenAI, the employment rate for early-career individuals aged 22 to 25 in high-exposure jobs has seen a relative decrease of approximately 13%. 报道援引斯坦福大学的一项研究称，自 GenAI 普及以来，22 至 25 岁的早期职业群体在高暴露度岗位的就业率出现了约 13% 的相对下降。

Smith admitted that AI will lead to a "reshuffle" of jobs, especially in sales and junior positions. Meanwhile, media reports suggested that Vista is considering layoffs and replacing some positions with AI. Smith denied claims of a 30% layoff rate but acknowledged that the company is slowing down its hiring pace. Smith 承认，AI 将带来岗位「洗牌」，尤其在销售和初级岗位领域。与此同时，有媒体报道称 Vista 正考虑裁员并以 AI 替代部分岗位。Smith 否认裁员比例高达 30% 的说法，但承认公司正在放缓招聘节奏。

item.title: Google DeepMind 推出游戏陪玩 Agent SIMA 2
item.guid: Google-DeepMind-推出游戏陪玩-Agent-SIMA-2
item.description:
Recently, Google announced the official launch of its new generation AI agent, "SIMA 2," powered by the Gemini model. It is positioned as an interactive gaming companion capable of reasoning, conversing, and self-improving in virtual 3D worlds. 近日，Google 宣布正式推出新一代 AI 代理「SIMA 2」，其核心由 Gemini 模型驱动，定位为可在虚拟 3D 世界中进行推理、对话和自我改进的互动型游戏伙伴。

SIMA 1 had previously completed basic commands like "turn left" and "climb ladder" in over 600 commercial game environments, while SIMA 2 can now successfully complete complex tasks in untrained games such as ASKA and MineDojo, performing more like a human player. SIMA 1 曾在超过 600 款商业游戏环境中完成「向左转」「爬梯子」等基础指令，而 SIMA 2 已能在未训练过的游戏如 ASKA 和 MineDojo 中成功完成复杂任务，表现更接近人类玩家。

Furthermore, its multimodal understanding capabilities support input via language, images, and even emojis, and it can transfer concepts across games, for example, applying the experience of "mining" to "harvesting" scenarios. 此外，其多模态理解能力支持语言、图像甚至表情符号输入，并能跨游戏迁移概念，例如将「采矿」的经验应用到「收获」场景。

DeepMind stated that SIMA 2's training combines human demonstration videos with Gemini-generated language labels, forming a 'self-improvement loop'. DeepMind 表示，SIMA 2 的训练结合了人类演示视频与 Gemini 生成的语言标签，形成「自我提升循环」。

SIMA 2 can continuously optimize through trial-and-error learning and self-generated experience, reducing reliance on manual data. Tests show that SIMA 2 demonstrates unprecedented adaptability in long-chain tasks and newly generated virtual worlds. SIMA 2 可通过试错学习和自生成经验不断优化，减少对人工数据的依赖。测试显示，SIMA 2 在长链条任务和新生成的虚拟世界中展现出前所未有的适应性。

However, the research team also pointed out that SIMA 2 still faces challenges in handling extremely complex, multi-step tasks, with short-term memory limitations and low-level action execution precision yet to be overcome. The project is currently in a research preview phase, open only to selected academic institutions and developers to gather feedback and promote 'responsible AI development'. 不过，研究团队也指出，SIMA 2 在处理极复杂、多步骤任务时仍存在挑战，短期记忆限制和低层动作执行精度尚待突破。该项目目前处于研究预览阶段，仅向部分学术机构和开发者开放，以便收集反馈并推动「负责任的 AI 开发」。

item.title: 胖东来上架透明可乐，售价三倍于普通款
item.guid: 胖东来上架透明可乐，售价三倍于普通款
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, Pang Dong Lai recently launched a transparent cola priced at 11.5 yuan/bottle in its stores, attracting consumer attention. 据界面新闻报道，胖东来近日在门店上架一款售价 11.5 元/瓶的透明可乐，引发消费者关注。

This 550ml drink is produced in Thailand, featuring a sugar-free, transparent appearance. Its taste is similar to traditional sugar-free cola, but its price is almost three times that of regular cola. 这款 550ml 的饮品产自泰国，主打无糖、透明的外观，口感与传统无糖可乐接近，但价格几乎是普通可乐的三倍。

The report points out that transparent beverages are not a new phenomenon. As early as 1992, Pepsi launched 'Crystal Pepsi,' but it ultimately failed due to vague positioning. Such products periodically resurface in the market, often marketed with selling points like 'light burden' and 'purity'. 报道指出，透明饮料并非首次出现。早在 1992 年，百事曾推出「Crystal Pepsi（水晶可乐）」，但因定位模糊最终失败。此类产品在市场上周期性回潮，常以「轻负担」「纯净」为卖点。

Currently, transparent beverages are experiencing a resurgence in the Asian market. Suntory Pepsi launched 'Pepsi Clear' in Thailand, changing its advertising slogan from 'Be Real' to 'Be Clear,' emphasizing freshness and purity. 目前，透明饮品在亚洲市场再度兴起。三得利百事在泰国推出「Pepsi Clear」，广告口号由「Be Real」转为「Be Clear」，强调清爽与纯粹。

Coca-Cola also launched 'Coca-Cola Clear' in Japan and has re-released it multiple times for a limited period. Besides cola, transparent milk tea, transparent lemon black tea, transparent coffee, transparent soy sauce, and other products have successively appeared, with even transparent tomato nutrient water and transparent protein water. 可口可乐也曾在日本推出「Coca-Cola Clear」，并多次限时复刻。除可乐外，透明奶茶、透明柠檬红茶、透明咖啡、透明酱油等产品陆续出现，甚至有透明番茄营养水和透明蛋白质水。

Industry analysis suggests that the appeal of transparent beverages lies in their 'contrast' and psychological suggestion: their appearance is close to water, conveying signals of low-calorie and no burden, while also being more readily accepted in public settings. 业内分析认为，透明饮料的吸引力在于其「反差感」与心理暗示：外观接近水，传递低卡、无负担的信号，同时在公共场合更易被接受。

item.title: 库里与安德玛分手，库里品牌将独立发展
item.guid: 库里与安德玛分手，库里品牌将独立发展
item.description:
Yesterday, Under Armour announced the end of its 12-year partnership with NBA four-time champion Stephen Curry, with his Curry Brand separating from the brand system to operate independently. 昨天，安德玛宣布与 NBA 四冠球星斯蒂芬 · 库里结束长达 12 年的合作关系，旗下 Curry Brand 将从品牌体系中分离并独立运营。

This decision signifies the formal termination of Under Armour's strategy to emulate Nike's creation of 'Air Jordan' with Michael Jordan. According to the company's statement, both parties will maintain their partnership until October 2026, with the final generation of Curry's signature shoe, the Curry 13, set to be released in February 2026. 这一决定意味着安德玛试图效仿耐克与乔丹打造「Air Jordan」的战略正式终止。根据公司声明，双方仍将维持合作至 2026 年 10 月，最后一代库里签名鞋 Curry 13 将于 2026 年 2 月发布。

Under Armour CEO Kevin Plank emphasized in 2023 that he 'couldn't imagine Under Armour without Curry,' but as the company's financial pressure intensified, the partnership ultimately ended in separation. 安德玛 CEO 凯文 · 普兰克在 2023 年曾强调「无法想象没有库里的安德玛」，但随着公司财务压力加剧，这段合作最终走向分手。

Data shows that Under Armour's revenue for fiscal year 2025 was $5.2 billion, a 9% year-over-year decrease, with a net loss of $201 million. Revenue in the Asia-Pacific region was $755 million, a 13% year-over-year decrease, with the Chinese market performing particularly poorly. 数据显示，安德玛 2025 财年营收 52 亿美元，同比下降 9%，净亏损 2.01 亿美元，其中亚太区营收 7.55 亿美元，同比下降 13%，中国市场表现尤为低迷。

Curry's signing with Under Armour began in 2013 when Nike failed to renew his contract, and Under Armour brought him in with a $4 million per year deal. Curry subsequently won his first NBA championship in 2015, driving a surge in signature shoe sales. 库里签约安德玛始于 2013 年，当时耐克未能续约，安德玛以每年 400 万美元的合同将其收入麾下。库里随后在 2015 年夺得首个 NBA 总冠军，并推动签名鞋销量暴增。

According to Morgan Stanley's estimates, Curry once generated up to $14 billion in potential value for Under Armour. However, with the company's failed expansion, missed athleisure trends, and the rapid rise of local brands like Anta and Li-Ning, Under Armour gradually lost competitiveness in the Chinese market. 据摩根士丹利估算，库里曾为安德玛创造高达 140 亿美元的潜在价值。然而，随着公司扩张失利、错过运动休闲风潮，以及本土品牌安踏、李宁的快速崛起，安德玛在中国市场逐渐失去竞争力。

36Kr's report suggests that Under Armour's move is a strategic choice of 'cutting off an arm to save the body.' By abandoning its most expensive celebrity asset, the company hopes to concentrate resources on returning to its core businesses, especially in the comprehensive training and American football sectors. Whether Under Armour can leverage this to re-establish its brand positioning and regain consumers remains to be seen. 36 氪的报道认为，安德玛此举是「断臂求生」的战略选择。通过放弃最昂贵的明星资产，公司希望集中资源回归核心业务，尤其是综训与橄榄球领域。未来，安德玛能否借此重整品牌定位并重新赢得消费者，仍有待观察。

item.title: One Fun Thing｜美团「送花致敬」饿了么更名
item.guid: One-Fun-Thing｜美团「送花致敬」饿了么更名
item.description:
Yesterday, Meituan launched a 'tribute' event on its food delivery platform for Ele.me's name change, offering virtual flower redemption coupons and discount vouchers. It also penned an open letter starting with 'Dear Blue,' signed 'Your Yellow Who Will Always Remember You,' sparking heated discussion among netizens. The topic 'Meituan holds a memorial service for Ele.me' also trended on hot searches. 昨天，美团在外卖平台上线「致敬」饿了么改名送花领券专场活动，推出虚拟鲜花兑换券及满减优惠，并以「亲爱的蓝」为开头撰写公开信，署名「永远记得你的黄」，引发网友热议。「美团给饿了么开追悼会」相关话题也一度登上热搜。

According to previous reports, the Ele.me App officially rebranded as 'Taobao Flash Buy' after updating to version 12.0.1 in November, marking its full integration into Alibaba Group's instant retail strategic system. 据此前报道，饿了么 App 在 11 月更新至 12.0.1 版本后正式更名为「淘宝闪购」，标志着其全面接入阿里集团即时零售战略体系。

After integration, Ele.me transitioned from an independent food delivery platform to a fulfillment infrastructure. Its original 4 million rider capacity and merchant resources are fully integrated into Taobao Flash Buy, aiming to achieve '30-minute delivery of everything'. 整合后，饿了么从独立外卖平台转型为履约基础设施，原有 400 万骑手运力与商家资源全面接入淘宝闪购，目标实现「30 分钟送万物」。

item.title: 周末看什么｜《鬼灭之刃：无限城篇》昨日上映
item.guid: 周末看什么｜《鬼灭之刃：无限城篇》昨日上映
item.description:
The Japanese animated film 'Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Infinity Castle Arc, Chapter 1: Akaza's Return' was released yesterday in mainland China. This marks the first time the 'Demon Slayer' series has appeared on the mainland big screen, with a runtime of 155 minutes, consistent with the Japanese version and uncut. 日本动画电影《鬼灭之刃：无限城篇 第一章 猗窝座再袭》已于昨天在中国内地上映。这是「鬼灭之刃」系列首次登陆内地大银幕，片长 155 分钟，与日本版保持一致，一刀未剪。

The plot of this film continues from "Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc", depicting Tanjiro and the Demon Slayer Corps' final confrontation with Upper Rank Demons and Muzan Kibutsuji after falling into the Infinity Castle. The film visually blends Ukiyo-e aesthetics with modern special effects, enhancing the artistic tension and immersion of the scenes. 本片剧情承接《鬼灭之刃 柱训练篇》，讲述炭治郎与鬼杀队坠入无限城后，与上弦之鬼及鬼舞辻无惨展开最终对决。影片在视觉表现上融合浮世绘美学与现代特效，强化了场景的艺术张力与沉浸感。

The film is co-directed by Haruo Sotozaki and Hikaru Kondo, and premiered in Japan on July 18, 2025. 该片由外崎春雄与近藤光联合执导，2025 年 7 月 18 日在日本首映。

Since its global release, the film has grossed approximately $670 million worldwide, ranking among the top five highest-grossing films of 2025. As of publication, the film has received high ratings on multiple platforms: IMDb score 8.5, Rotten Tomatoes freshness 98%, Douban score 8.8, and is considered by the industry as a "phenomenal animated film of the year". 自全球公映以来，该片累计票房约 6.7 亿美元，位列 2025 年全球票房前五。截至发稿，影片在多平台获得高分评价：IMDb 评分 8.5、烂番茄新鲜度 98%、豆瓣评分 8.8，被业内视为「现象级年度动画」。

item.title: 买书不读指南｜《艺术的转向》
item.guid: 买书不读指南｜《艺术的转向》
item.description:
"The Turn of Art" is written by French anthropologist René Girard. Taking the filming of the interview documentary "Sense of History" as an opportunity, the book collects Girard's articles from the 1950s to the late 1980s, systematically presenting the extension of his "mimetic desire" theory in the field of art. 《艺术的转向》由法国人类学家勒内·基拉尔撰写。该书以访谈纪录片《历史感》的拍摄为契机，收录了基拉尔在 1950 年代至 1980 年代末的文章，系统呈现其「模仿欲望」理论在艺术领域的延展。

Girard believes that human desires do not originate from instinct but are generated through imitation, a view highly regarded in international academia. 基拉尔认为，人的欲望并非源于本能，而是通过模仿生成，这一观点在国际学界享有盛誉。

The book not only reinterprets the works of artists like Nietzsche and Wagner but also emphasizes the social function of art. Girard points out that the value of art is not merely aesthetic pleasure, but rather lies in intensifying societal anxiety, thereby revealing deep-seated social contradictions. 书中不仅重新解读尼采、瓦格纳等艺术家的创作，还强调艺术的社会功能。基拉尔指出，艺术的价值并非单纯的美学享受，而在于加剧时代焦虑，从而揭示社会深层矛盾。

He criticizes modern art for becoming "dehumanized" due to an excessive pursuit of form, losing its ability to transcend the violence of its era. This perspective appears independent and sharp against the backdrop of postmodern thought, and is regarded as a profound reflection on the relationship between contemporary art and anthropology. 他批评现代艺术因过度追求形式而走向「非人化」，失去了超越时代暴力的能力。这一观点在后现代思潮背景下显得独立而尖锐，被视为对当代艺术与人类学关系的深度反思。

The publisher emphasizes that "The Turn of Art" is an important text for philosophical and art studies, and also provides a new reference for understanding the social function of art in the age of AI. 出版方强调，《艺术的转向》是哲学与艺术研究的重要文本，同时也为理解 AI 时代下艺术的社会功能提供了新的参照。

item.title: 游戏推荐｜《ARC Raiders》
item.guid: 游戏推荐｜《ARC-Raiders》
item.description:
The multiplayer co-op extraction shooter game "ARC Raiders" quickly gained popularity after its release, with sales briefly surpassing "Battlefield 6" and topping the Steam weekly sales chart. 多人合作撤离射击游戏《ARC Raiders》在发售后迅速走红，销量一度超越《战地 6》，登顶 Steam 周销榜榜首。

The game is set on a future Earth dominated by mysterious mechanical enemies called ARC. Players must explore, fight, and survive between the dangerous surface and underground societies. Its features include highly immersive map design, a unique skill tree system, and a multiplayer combat mode that emphasizes cooperation and competition. 游戏背景设定在被神秘机械敌人 ARC 主宰的未来地球，玩家需在危险的地表与地下社会之间探索、战斗与生存。其特色在于高度沉浸的地图设计、独特的技能树系统，以及强调合作与竞争的多人对战模式。

Yesterday, IGN released its final review, giving the game a high score of 9, believing that it sets a new benchmark for extraction shooters with its fluid gunplay and thrilling loot acquisition mechanics. 昨天，IGN 公布了最终评测，给予该作 9 分高分，认为其凭借流畅的枪战体验和紧张刺激的战利品获取机制，为撤离射击游戏树立了新的标杆。

IGN pointed out that "ARC Raiders" excels in gunplay tension, progression systems, and loot mechanics, and even with a few bugs, the overall experience is still excellent. IGN 指出，《ARC Raiders》在枪战张力、进程系统和战利品机制方面表现突出，即使存在少量 BUG，整体体验仍堪称卓越。

"ARC Raiders" officially launched on October 30, 2025, and players can experience it on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X platforms. With over 700,000 concurrent players and sales exceeding 4 million copies since its launch, "ARC Raiders" has become one of the most anticipated new shooter titles globally. 《ARC Raiders》于 2025 年 10 月 30 日正式上线，玩家可在 PC、PS5 和 Xbox Series X 平台体验。随着上线后玩家在线人数突破 70 万、销量突破 400 万份，《ARC Raiders》已成为全球范围内最受关注的新晋射击作品之一。
